title: PMS 2.0 735 - THE NFL IS BACK, Bills vs. Rams Preview, Super Bowl Predictions, Joey Burrow, Andrew Whitworth, Darius Butler In Studio, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, Darius Butler, and the boys chat all about tonight's NFL opening kickoff game between the Bills and Rams from SoFi Stadium in Los Angeles, Pat concocts a Same Game Parlay available exclusively on FanDuel, and they give their Super Bowl Predictions. Joining the progrum is Heisman Trophy Winner, #1 Pick in the 2020 NFL Draft, 2021 NFL Comeback Player of the Year, one of the coolest dudes on the planet, Joey Burrow, to chat about the success of last season, his crazy journey over the past five years, what his life is like now being a Superstar QB in his home state, the outlook for this season, why he loves getting hit, and more (14:50-42:07). Later, Super Bowl Champion, 2021 Walter Payton Man of the Year, 4x Pro Bowler, 3x All-Pro, now NFL Analyst for Amazon Prime, Andrew Whitworth joins the progrum from SoFi Stadium to chat about tonight's game, why he thinks the Rams are set to be better this year, what the banner ceremony is going to be like, who the top 3 pass rushers he's ever faced are, how good Aaron Donald is, Matt Stafford and Sean McVay's relationship, and more (1:47:15-2:00:57). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. Enjoy the game tonight.. we made it. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
